title: Countries with the lowest fertility rate globally 2050 to 2055
yAxis: Average number of children per woman
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average number of children per woman for 25 number of Countrys.
The Average number of children per woman is appeared to be the highest at Country Brunei Darussalam and lowest at Country Singapore.
The Average number of children per woman of Country Brunei Darussalam is 1.15% larger than the minimum value at Singapore.
min_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Average number of children per woman in each Country on the y axis.
Country Brunei Darussalam has the highest Average number of children per woman and Singapore has the lowest Average number of children per woman.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average number of children per woman for 25 number of Countrys.
The Average number of children per woman is appeared to be the highest at Country Brunei Darussalam and lowest at Country Singapore.
The Average number of children per woman of Country Brunei Darussalam is 1.15% larger than the minimum value at Singapore.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Average number of children per woman in the y axis.
Country Brunei Darussalam has the highest Average number of children per woman and Singapore has the lowest Average number of children per woman.
Second maximum Average number of children per woman is found at Country Canada.
The difference of Average number of children per woman between the highest and lowest Country is 0.21.
The Country Brunei Darussalam has the highest Average number of children per woman, followed by Canada, and Canada. Down to the Country Singapore which is the lowest.
Country Brunei Darussalam, Portugal, Spain, and Canada have the same Average number of children per woman.
The Country Brunei Darussalam tends to be 1.04 percent higher than average.
